articles.title: India Sees US As Weak, Doesn't Trust Americans To Lead: Nikki Haley - NDTV
articles.description: Aspiring Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley on Wednesday said that India wants to be a partner with the US, but as of now they don't trust Americans to lead.
articles.content:
India has always played smart and stayed close with Russia, said Nikki Haley. (File)

articles.title: Westchester County issues health alert over American Legion Hall events - News 12 Westchester
articles.description: The Westchester County Department of Health is investigating two cases of the parasitic infection toxoplasmosis after American Legion events.
articles.content: The Westchester County Health Department recommends people who attended a "Game Dinner" held at the American Legion Post in Mount Kisco on Jan. 19 and Jan. 20 to contact their doctors after several p… [+1604 chars]
